Title: Is there an app that blocks certain search words on kindle fire?

history.Text: I want to block certain words like "pornographic" on search engines like Yahoo, Google, Bing, etc without blocking my whole search engines. Is there anything on the kindle fire HD that can do that or apps.
Is there an app that blocks certain search words on kindle fire?
